title: Inner Silence Guided Meditation | Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar
description:
Inner Silence is a powerful guided meditation for healing by Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar. This meditation technique helps you experience the journey from the ceaseless chatter of the mind to the serenity of a still mind.

About #Gurudev: 
World-renowned humanitarian, spiritual leader, and an ambassador of peace and human values. Through his life and work, Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar has inspired millions around the world with a vision of a stress-free and violence-free world. Gurudev founded The Art of Living, a non-profit organization that is engaged in stress-management and service initiatives across the world.

Learn Sudarshan Kriya the world's most powerful breathing technique: https://aoliv.in/learnsudarshankriya

channelDescription:
This is the official YouTube channel of Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar.

Gurudev is a humanitarian and spiritual leader, an ambassador of peace and human values. Through his life and work, Gurudev has inspired millions around the world with a vision of a stress-free world. He has founded courses that provide techniques and tools to live a deeper, more joyous life and he has established nonprofit organisations that recognise a common human identity above the boundaries of race, nationality, and religion.

Know more: https://gurudev.artofliving.org/

comments: Want to discover more meditations by Gurudev? Get the Art of Living app: aoliv.in/aolapp

Gurudev,
Please bless the whole universe to make the same as 'Happy World Family, ❤❤❤🎉

Let all distractions come into your mind while doing meditation. Do not force them out. I believe essence of practicing meditation is just that there will be a state when you will not even realize these distractions. You will get to a point when you will be in full control. Nothing will or can bother you. That is the real peace one will experience. One will be happy. One will have power to focus on important meaningful positive things in life. Remember the power of keeping a smiling face...it is like on and off switch. Try ...as soon as you turn the switch on by having a smiling face...all things around you becomes magically calm, happy, forgiving, and positively forward looking. Keep smiling face while doing meditation.

jai gurudev, today i got the fortune to see Shri Shri , live in front of me, and He meditated with us.... I didnt believe or even didnt know the power of meditation... but today i experienced myself, how effortlessly i dived into space around me , leaving my body... i know now wht it feels like..... blessed to have had this day...

What goodness have l done to have such a Divine Guru .....let me be deserving for Him forever and ever..
Pranams on His Lotus Feet..
